sentences.english: A cold breeze 19)wafted through my hair.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷的微風吹過我的頭髮。

sentences.english: On one of many cold frosty nights, I shut my caravan door behind me and took a step out into the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 在一個寒冷的霜夜，我關上房車的門，慢慢步入黑暗。

sentences.english: The dampness is unpleasant , not to mention the cold .
sentences.chinese: 潮溼就令人不快，更不必說寒冷了。

sentences.english: Cold, dank caverns are actually not to Reeves’ liking.
sentences.chinese: 李維斯其實並不喜歡這些寒冷而潮溼的洞穴。

sentences.english: It in the test of whether we can fit the summer heat and winter cold.
sentences.chinese: 它在考驗我們是否能適合夏季的炎熱和冬季的寒冷。

sentences.english: But he said most people have a limit to how much cold they can take.
sentences.chinese: 但是克龍海姆說，多數人對寒冷的忍耐是有限的。

sentences.english: In construction site, air is thin, oxygen is lack and it is very cold.
sentences.chinese: 施工區空氣稀薄，嚴重缺氧，氣候寒冷。
寒冷的天氣使他皮膚皸裂。

sentences.english: It was a cold winter’s day that Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 這是冬季裏的一個寒冷的禮拜天。

sentences.english: Houses were dark and grisly under the blank, cold sky.
sentences.chinese: 在空寂寒冷的天空下，房屋顯得模糊而恐怖。

sentences.english: Cold doth not sting, the pretty birds do sing.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷不再砭骨，美麗的鳥兒處處啼唱。

sentences.english: Also, cold exposure markedly increased plasma cortisol and plasma catecholamines levels of rats.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷使動物血漿皮質醇和兒茶酚胺含量明顯增加。

sentences.english: The nest happy eats the taste to swallow color food mutually when the weather is cold.
sentences.chinese: 窩歡喫味吞色互的食品在天氣寒冷時。

sentences.english: The cold weather set back the planting by two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷的天氣使插秧推遲兩個星期。

sentences.english: It was in the park that I met Li Hua on a coldafternoon.
sentences.chinese: 在一個寒冷的下午，我是在公園裏遇見李華的。

definition: cold weather, frozen ground (idiom); bitterly cold
cold air current/cold ocean current/cold stream
